title: Excavating Belief

key_realizations: Recursionists are brilliant scientists who were right too early
Soren's original 2019 paper was mathematically correct
All members were destroyed academically for correct theories
Government has been experimenting with temporal mechanics since 2024
Reyes lost partner to Project Chronos timeline erasure
elliot_state.emotional_state: Increasingly sympathetic to Recursionists despite cult aspects

reyes_revelation.project_chronos: Discovered - government temporal experiments, catastrophic failure
reyes_revelation.partner_erasure: Reyes' partner was 'Observer Two', displaced from timeline
reyes_revelation.reyes_trauma: Five years being called delusional for remembering erased person
reyes_revelation.strategic_implication: Reyes hunting for validation, not just duty

cassandra_state.research_progress: Analyzing Recursionist historical data, finding 40% valid
cassandra_state.position_evolution: Acknowledging Recursionists have genuine scientific insights

plot_progression.recursionist_understanding: Deep dive into community motivations and history
plot_progression.reyes_complexity: Established as traumatized truth-seeker, not simple antagonist
plot_progression.preparation_status: Learning techniques, attending meditation sessions reluctantly

planted_elements_status.reyes_partner: PLANTED - Observer Two erasure, will pay off in Ch37

key_quotes: When everyone calls you crazy and you know you're right, belief becomes identity.
She's not hunting the signal to suppress it. She's hunting it to understand what happened to her.
